title: Quigley Down Under
description: After traveling to Australia for a job, a sharpshooting cowboy becomes a target himself when he refuses an immoral assignment from a corrupt landowner.

title: Boyka: Undisputed
description: The fourth film in the action franchise finds Boyka taking on brutal gangsters to protect the widow of a man he unintentionally killed in the ring.

title: Acts of Violence
description: When his future sister-in-law is kidnapped by human traffickers, a military veteran joins forces with his brothers and a world-weary cop to rescue her.

title: Braven
description: A logger defends himself and his family from a group of murderous drug traffickers who have hidden a stash of heroin in his hunting cabin.

title: Gridlocked
description: An embittered cop is tasked with baby-sitting a spoiled actor, but the two must learn to fight together when they run afoul of a group of mercenaries.

title: Hunt to Kill
description: U.S. Border Patrol agent and deadly hunter Jim Rhodes takes violent revenge when a group of desperate thieves kidnaps his daughter after a robbery.

title: Standoff
description: After witnessing an assassin's slaughter, a young girl holes up in a farmhouse with a suicidal vet, who must use wits and guts to fend off the killer.

title: Marauders
description: A series of high-stakes thefts at banks owned by a manipulative millionaire sparks an FBI agent to suspect a sinister plan behind the deadly heists.

title: The Assignment
description: A hitman has his body surgically altered into a woman's against his will. Now he has to track down the surgeon responsible and get his revenge.

title: Point Blank
description: To save his pregnant wife, an emergency room nurse unwillingly partners with an injured murder suspect in a race against time and renegade cops.

title: Inglourious Basterds

title: Ninja Assassin
description: When his best friend is murdered by the shadowy Ozunu clan, Raizo, an orphan raised to be an assassin, vows revenge.

title: Lady Bloodfight
description: An American travels to Hong Kong in hopes of winning a lucrative – but potentially deadly – all-female underground fighting tournament.

title: Peppermint
description: After her family is murdered, a mild-mannered mom remakes herself into a badass vigilante in order to exact violent justice.

title: Haywire
description: A last-minute mission in Dublin turns deadly for stunning secret operative Mallory Kane when she realizes she's been betrayed.

title: 24 Hours to Live
description: Revived by an experimental procedure, a hit man gets to live an extra 24 hours – which he uses to avenge his dead wife and child and redeem himself.

title: Skin Trade
description: A New Jersey detective whose family was killed by an international gangster teams up with a Bangkok cop on a quest to bring down a criminal empire.

title: All the Devil's Men

title: Avengement

description: To clear his criminal record, an ex-special forces soldier agrees to lead a team to retrieve a double-crossing mercenary and deliver him to justice.

title: London Heist
description: After a heist gone wrong, a career criminal gradually uncovers the hidden motive behind his father's murder – and it has nothing to do with money.

title: Outlawed
description: After a failed mission, an ex-Royal Marines Commando tries to overcome his demons while investigating the death of his ex-girlfriend's father.

title: Pusher
description: In this remake of a 1996 Danish thriller, a drug pusher incurs his suppliers' wrath when he gets busted and is left without the money he owes.

title: First Kill
description: A stock broker brings his young son back to the town where he grew up for a hunting trip, but things take a dangerous turn when they witness a crime.

title: Casino Royale
description: Daniel Craig makes his debut as the newly minted agent 007, who's pitted against an infamous financier of global terrorism – at the poker table.

description: A nobleman who values his people's well-being over his emperor's edicts is killed. His knights vow revenge.

title: Die Another Day

title: Quantum of Solace
description: Picking up an hour after the events of 2006's Casino Royale, this James Bond adventure finds 007 tracking a traitor who's infiltrated Britain's MI6.

title: The Debt Collector
description: A broke martial arts instructor takes a side gig with a mobster, who pairs him with a veteran thug for a weekend of fisticuffs-fueled debt collection.

title: The Hurricane Heist
description: A deadly hurricane with mile-high waves provides the perfect cover for stealing $600 million from a U.S. Treasury outpost in Mississippi.

description: Greed, revenge, world domination: It's all in a day's work for James Bond, who's on a mission to protect an oil heiress from a notorious terrorist.

description: Pierce Brosnan stars in this 007 installment, which teams the secret agent and a sexy Chinese superspy against a megalomaniacal media mogul.

title: Act of Valor
description: An elite squad of Navy SEALs is tasked with rescuing a kidnapped CIA agent from a lethal terrorist cell.

title: American Assassin
description: After grad student Mitch Rapp suffers a tragic loss during a terrorist attack, his single-minded thirst for vengeance catches the interest of the CIA.

title: Batman: The Killing Joke
description: The Joker makes life hell for the Gordon family in a monstrous attempt to prove to Batman that one bad day can drive a good man to madness.

description: A tenderfoot and two gamblers seeking their fortunes in a boom town instead find themselves defending it from a gunslinging preacher and his gang.

title: Black Site Delta
description: After discovering that their secret military prison is under attack by terrorists, a ragtag group of inmates does their best to neutralize the enemy.

title: Dante's Peak
description: When a volcanologist comes to investigate the recent rumblings of a dormant volcano, a massive eruption has everyone in town fighting for their lives.

title: Den of Thieves

description: When terrorists hijack a 747 and turn it into a nerve gas bomb aimed at Washington, D.C., commandos use an experimental plane to try to stop them.

description: When a billionaire hires a team of mercenaries for protection, they soon realize world-changing technology and his daughter’s life are also at stake.

title: Hickok
description: While serving as the marshal of rowdy Abilene, Kansas, "Wild Bill" Hickok uses guns and gall to tidy up the lawless frontier town.

title: In a Valley of Violence
description: After a quiet drifter is met with violence and bullying in a small town, he finds himself enmeshed in a vengeful struggle with the local marshal.

description: A hotshot NYPD negotiator butts heads with the FBI and meets his match in a meticulous criminal mastermind as she attempts to rob the Federal Reserve.

description: After a skilled fighter falls in the ring, his younger brother emerges from the shadows to train and get revenge against a brutal champion.

description: The Bride has three left on her rampage list: Budd, Elle Driver and Bill himself. But when she arrives at Bill's house, she's in for a surprise.

description: Posing as a telecom salesman at a business conference, a CIA agent fights to protect a fledgling Eastern European democracy from a military coup.

title: Officer Downe
description: Fallen Los Angeles police officer Terrence Downe finds new life as a secret weapon: a scientifically altered super-cop with unlimited lives.

description: A disgraced Secret Service agent must come to the rescue when Korean terrorists descend on the White House and take the president hostage.

title: Project Power

description: An elite international squad of uniquely skilled special forces is assembled to combat a rising underground terrorist threat in the Middle East.

description: When their leader is captured by an extremist organization, a special forces team stages a perilous rescue mission as time runs out.

title: S.W.A.T.
description: A veteran cop is tasked with drafting and training a special weapons and tactics team, who soon find themselves up against an international criminal.

description: In this dramatic recreation, U.S. Navy SEAL Team 6 trains for a critical mission, then executes a tough nighttime raid on Osama Bin Laden's compound.

description: After taking a job as a mall security guard, a former Marine steps up to protect a young girl who's being hunted by heavily armed mercenaries.

title: Set Up
description: A diamond heist goes horribly wrong, and the group of friends who sought to make a fortune must instead fight for their very survival.

title: Swordfish
description: Determined to get his mitts on $9 billion in a secret DEA account so he can fight terrorism, a rogue agent recruits an encryption expert to hack in.

description: A motley crew of bank robbers plans their next heist after a former colleague convinces them to target an armored car carrying $20 million.

title: The 2nd
description: A Secret Service agent is drawn into a terrorist plot when his son's classmate, the daughter of a Supreme Court Justice, is targeted for kidnapping.

description: French and Sue have two days to collect on three debts, using as much force as it takes – all while evading the wrath of a crime lord out for revenge.

description: After learning his brother died on a mission in Romania, a former soldier teams up with two allies to hunt down a mysterious enemy and exact revenge.

description: New straight-arrow sheriff Wallace finds he must join forces with brutal ex-lawman Leland to protect a troubled border town from a cartel hit man.

description: After terrorists trigger a nuclear blast in Russia, a U.S. Special Forces intelligence agent and a nuclear weapons expert come to the rescue.

description: A turbulent vacation turns deadly when a fugitive and his crew kidnap a river rafting guide and her family, forcing them down the dangerous river.

title: The Saint
description: Master thief Simon Templar – also known as the Saint – is hired by a wealthy banker to find his kidnapped daughter, but not all is as it seems.

title: Tracers

description: Legendary lawman Wyatt Earp is continually at odds with a gang of renegade cowboys, culminating in a fiery showdown with the outlaws at the OK Corral.

description: In this action-packed follow-up to XXX, U.S. intelligence officer Augustus Gibbons must thwart a massive conspiracy to overthrow the government.

description: An ex-racecar driver is sent to a barbaric prison where, to get pardoned, he must defeat the inmate known as Frankenstein in a lethal "Death Race."

description: Framed for the murder of an ambassador, a former member of the United Nations' elite covert action unit will do whatever it takes to clear his name.

title: War
description: When his partner is killed and all clues point to a notorious assassin, FBI agent Jack Crawford sets out for revenge in this taut action-thriller.

description: A security expert and ex-CIA agent living in Belgium must go on the run with his estranged teen daughter when they're both marked for assassination.

description: The adventures of adolescent ninja Naruto Uzumaki continue as he's tasked with protecting a priestess from a demon – but to do so, he must die.

description: Accompanied by his father, Indiana Jones sets off on his third adventure to explore the cradle of civilization on a perilous hunt for the Holy Grail.

description: When Indiana Jones is hired by the government to locate the legendary Ark of the Covenant, he finds himself up against the entire Nazi regime.

title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
description: Indiana Jones, his young sidekick and a spoiled songbird get more than they bargained for when they go to India in search of a missing magical stone.

description: Jake's date with his dream girl takes a turn when she disappears, and Jake's grandpa – a former intelligence officer – sets out to find her.

title: Popeye

description: A young Han Solo tries to settle an old score with the help of his new buddy Chewbacca, a crew of space smugglers and a cunning old friend.

title: Star Wars: Episode VIII: The Last Jedi
description: As the remnants of the Resistance flee Kylo Ren and the First Order, Rey seeks out Luke Skywalker – but he wants nothing more to do with the Force.

description: A stylin' special agent chases down drug lords and does her part to stop trafficking. Soon, she finds herself seeking revenge on a dealer.

title: Ocean's Eleven

title: Mad Max
description: In a post-apocalyptic future, a malicious gang murders Max's family as an act of retaliation, forcing Max to hit the open road seeking vengeance.

title: The Great Gambler
description: After unwittingly using his skills to obtain military secrets, a gambler is pursued by a police officer who happens to be his doppelgänger.

title: Saladin

title: Bonnie and Clyde
description: Bonnie Parker and Clyde Barrow are young, in love and on the run during a bullet-riddled bank robbery spree across Depression-ravaged America.

title: Mutiny on the Bounty

title: Rocky
description: Sylvester Stallone shot to fame as Rocky Balboa, an unknown fighter who's given a shot at fighting world champ Apollo Creed as a publicity stunt.

title: Superfly
description: To get away from the thug life, cocaine dealer Youngblood Priest puts together one last deal that will net him enough money to start over.

description: In this epic spaghetti Western, a flinty gunslinger is hired by a railroad tycoon to kill anyone standing in the way of his trans-American iron horse.

title: Skiptrace
description: To capture a crime lord who killed his partner and kidnapped his partner's daughter, a Hong Kong detective teams with a smart aleck American gambler.

title: Blue Streak
description: A jewel thief returns to his hiding place after a stint in jail — only to find that his diamond is buried under a newly constructed police station.

description: Two crooks planning a bank heist wind up abducting a pizza delivery driver and force him to commit the robbery — with a strict time limit.

title: Barely Lethal

This intimate documentary follows rock star Artiwara Kongmalai on his historic, 2,215-kilometer charity run across Thailand in 2017.

A brilliant group of students become card-counting experts with the intent of swindling millions out of Las Vegas casinos by playing blackjack.

After one of his high school students attacks him, dedicated teacher Trevor Garfield grows weary of the gang warfare in the New York City school system and moves to California to teach there, thinking it must be a less hostile environment.

title: Billu

title: Bogda

title: Firebrand

description: Posted to a small, crime-ridden town, a cop soon learns that cleaning up the system also means confronting the corruption among police and politicians.

title: Guilty

title: Ringan

title: Emma' (Mother)
description: In 1950s Makassar, the life of a devoted mother is upended when another woman enters her husband's life.

description: The level-headed owner of a struggling coffee shop finds his future at risk when his partner – a talented but cocky barista – makes a major bet.

After a devastating earthquake hits Mexico City, trapped survivors from all walks of life wait to be rescued while trying desperately to stay alive.

title: El club de los insomnes

description: A young girl grows increasingly concerned about the rhino poaching in her village when it begins to directly impact her impoverished family.

description: In response to the repeated bigotry she faces, a Muslim teen in Amsterdam tries to find a sense of belonging in the world of fundamentalist Islam.

description: When a powerful businesswoman’s political ambitions are threatened by her underworld connections, the ensuing power struggle could cost her everything.

description: A terrifying home invasion shatters a couple's happy family life and brings their marriage to the brink as painful fallout unfolds.

description: A young boy's life shifts when he's sent to work at a mechanic's shop far from his suburban home until an opportunity forces him to make a tough choice.

description: A pampered heir must complete a year of service work to inherit his dad's assets but unearths new goals when he's placed in an unfamiliar region.

description: On a summer night in 1890 Ireland, the unsettled daughter of aristocrats coaxes her father's valet to seduce her, though he's engaged to their cook.

description: Inspired by real events, this drama follows a trucker jailed after driving five ill-fated travelers across Quetta, and the officer taking on his case.

description: High in the Andes, a teenage boy and his father work together as artisans. But their bond is shattered when the son learns of his father's secret life.

description: On an emotional journey in Morocco, an entrepreneur pieces together the turbulent life of his estranged mother and meets her adopted daughter.

description: Flashbacks reveal Gen. Antonio Luna's tireless fight for Filipino independence from the U.S. and his leadership in the Philippine-American War in 1899.

description: During Communist rule, a Polish gynecologist and sexologist defies taboo and fights to publish her groundbreaking book on love and sex.

description: A priest's duties are tested when a young guerrilla asks for absolution while confessing his plans to murder a local man he believes is a traitor.

description: A young boy from Johannesburg arrives in KwaZulu-Natal and begins to read letters for villagers — then falls in love with one of the recipients.

description: Loyalties are tested and cruelties revealed when four business partners spend a tense evening debating who will pay for the crime they committed.

description: In this new stand-up special, Norm Macdonald delivers sly, deadpan observations from an older – and perhaps even wiser – point of view.

title: Oh, Hello On Broadway
description: Two delusional geriatrics reveal curious pasts, share a love of tuna and welcome a surprise guest in this filming of the popular Broadway comedy show.

title: Patton Oswalt: Annihilation
description: By turns scathing and candid, Patton Oswalt reflects on the glut of comic material in the Trump era and the dark days following a personal tragedy.

title: Patton Oswalt: Talking for Clapping
description: On stage in San Francisco, the comedian covers topics like old people getting drugs, his worst stand-up set, gay proms and a horrible birthday clown.

title: Pete Davidson: Alive From New York
description: Comedian and "SNL" star Pete Davidson drops a candid and intimate stand-up special shot live in New York City.

title: Ralphie May: Imperfectly Yours
description: Comedian Ralphie May takes to the Las Vegas stage with his raw, rollicking take on men's fashion, racism, sex and even waffles. Filmed live in 2013.

description: Filmed in front of a raucous crowd, comedian Ralphie May unleashes his hilariously raunchy perspective in his first Netflix original stand-up special.

title: Ray Romano: Right Here, Around the Corner
description: Ray Romano cut his stand-up teeth at the Comedy Cellar in New York. Now, in his first comedy special in 23 years, he returns to where it all began.

title: Richard Pryor: Live in Concert
description: Richard Pryor's classic 1979 concert film has him discussing a wide range of topics, including race, the police and his favorite target – himself.

title: Rob Schneider: Asian Momma, Mexican Kids

title: Rodney Carrington: Here Comes the Truth
description: Raunchy country comic and musician Rodney Carrington jokes and sings about life in his 40s, poking fun at sex, relationships and gaining weight.

title: Ron White: If You Quit Listening, I'll Shut Up

title: Ronny Chieng: Asian Comedian Destroys America!
description: Ronny Chieng ("The Daily Show," "Crazy Rich Asians") takes center stage in this stand-up special and riffs on modern American life and more.

title: Rory Scovel Tries Stand-Up for the First Time
description: Comedian Rory Scovel storms the stage in Atlanta, where he shares unfocused thoughts about things that mystify him, relationships and the "Thong Song."

title: Russell Peters: Almost Famous
description: The comic comes home to Toronto to sound off on cultural quirks, kids' furniture and bathroom visits, reveling in all things ridiculously human.

title: Russell Peters: Notorious
description: Global comedy star Russell Peters leaves no ethnic or cultural stereotype unsatirized in this outrageous standup appearance in Sydney, Australia.

description: Small-town import Ryan Hamilton charms New York with folksy comic observations on big-city life, hot-air ballooning and going to Disney World alone.

title: Sam Jay: 3 In The Morning
description: Comedian and "Saturday Night Live" writer Sam Jay serves up fresh takes on relationships, travel nightmares, the audacity of white people and more.

title: Sam Kinison: Breaking the Rules
description: The one-time preacher shakes and shudders as he tears into subjects including sex, marriage, religion, drugs and famine in this HBO special.

title: Sam Kinison: Family Entertainment Hour
description: Comic Sam Kinison lets it rip with this performance at L.A.'s Wiltern theatre, skewering every segment of modern society from religion to television.

title: Sam Kinison: Live in Vegas
description: Standup legend Sam Kinison is at his screaming best as he storms the stage in Sin City to get a few things off his chest.

title: Sarah Silverman A Speck of Dust
description: In her first comedy special post-health scare, Sarah Silverman shares a mix of fun facts, sad truths and yeah-she-just-went-there moments.

title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Stay Hungry

title: Sebastian Maniscalco: What's Wrong with People?

title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That

title: Seth Meyers: Lobby Baby

title: Seth Rogen's Hilarity for Charity

title: Sommore: Chandelier Status

description: In a world where islands float in the sky, Gran encounters a mysterious girl wanted by the Erste Empire for her ability to summon Primal Beasts.

description: The "woman with the scissor blade" – Ryuko Matoi – searches for clues all around the world for the truth behind her father's death.

description: War looms over the kingdom of Neunatia, where two young women are both burdened and blessed by the power of song.

description: A land of mysterious ruins and a magical treasure hunt await young Aladdin and his courageous friend Alibaba for the adventure of their lives.

description: A year after their dissolution, the X-Men are re-assembled by Professor Charles Xavier to investigate the kidnapping of young mutants in Japan.

title: Megalobox
description: Created for the 50th anniversary of manga "Ashita No Joe," mechanized human fighters known as Megalo Boxers battle each other for boxing supremacy.

description: When Banagher Links meets the mysterious Audrey Burne, he inherits the Unicorn Gundam and is swept up into the battle for space colony independence.

description: On a terraformed post-disaster Mars, a group of child security agents rebel against the adults who betrayed them and the oppressive Earth government.

description: Guided by the spirit demon within him, orphaned Naruto learns to harness his powers as a ninja in this anime adventure series.

description: Fifteen years after the Second Impact, Shinji Ikari joins his father's group NERV as one of several teenage mecha pilots fighting the monstrous Angels.

description: Legendary gamer siblings Sora and Shiro are transported to a world where life is a series of games and humanity is in grave danger of extinction.

description: This animated adaptation of the quirky four-panel comic brings the random exploits of Popuko and Pipimi to life.

title: Saint Seiya: The Lost Canvas

description: Maka and the other students at the Death Weapon Meister Academy must kill 99 evil humans and one witch, absorbing their spirits when they die.

description: A young man becomes host to a legendary infernal sword and, with the fate of humanity now in his arm, wields its demonic power against his enemies.

description: Kusuo and his gaggle of self-proclaimed friends are back for more psychic mishaps. If he didn't have enough problems before, he's got even more now.

description: When a kingdom is taken over by tyrants, the deposed princess begins a quest to find a disbanded group of evil knights to help take back her realm.

description: Decades after the sudden birth of a new continent, a young rescuer-for-hire provides aid to adventurers exploring this dangerous, uncharted world.

description: When a Black Ghost scientist releases newly modified cyborgs and mysterious demons appear in Tokyo, the worlds of "Devilman" and "Cyborg 009" meet.

description: Immortal renegade Philly the Kid and his transforming pink Cadillac join a relentlessly upbeat friendship droid on her quest to find a missing prince.

title: KENGAN ASHURA
description: Ohma Tokita enters a hidden world where corporate disputes are settled in brutal gladiator bouts. Forget the money, he just wants to fight – and win.

title: Ultraman

title: Hi Score Girl

title: Teasing Master Takagi-san
description: Teased constantly by classmate Takagi-san, middle-schooler Nishikata swears payback by trying (and failing) to give her a dose of her own medicine.

title: Toradora!
description: Menacing in appearance but gentle at heart, Ryūji forms an unlikely friendship with Taiga, a tiny girl with a sharp tongue and a tough attitude.

title: Haikyu!!
description: Inspired by a championship match he sees on TV, junior high schooler Hinata joins a volleyball club and begins training, despite his short height.

description: Five middle school basketball stars went to separate high schools, and now Tetsuya Kuroko and Seirin High are making their play for glory.

title: The OA

title: The Vampire Diaries
description: Trapped in adolescent bodies, feuding vampire brothers Stefan and Damon vie for the affection of captivating teenager Elena.

title: The 4400

description: When the black sheep son of a respected family threatens to expose dark secrets from their past, sibling loyalties are put to the test.

title: Charmed
description: After their mother’s tragic death, a trio of sisters bond over their newfound powers, vanquish demons and band together to defend their magical legacy.

description: When grad student Quentin Coldwater enters a college specializing in magic, he learns that the mythic fantasy world he once read about is very real.

title: Containment

title: Chambers
